body_content.explanation: an object or person that records (an amount of) time:
examples: There's no point in having a clock which looks attractive if it isn't a good timekeeper (= if it doesn't show the correct time).

body_content.explanation: a person who records the amount of time that people taking part in a race or competition take to finish the race or competition, or the amount of time that people at work spend working on their jobs
a person who usually arrives on time/late for something, especially work
